description: This Java class 'CorsConfig' provides CORS configuration for a Spring Boot application. It reads allowed origins from environment variables or application properties, configures permitted HTTP methods, headers, and credentials, and registers this configuration for all URL paths.

classes.name: CorsConfig
classes.description: Configuration class that sets up Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) policies based on environment variables or application properties.

methods.name: corsConfigurationSource
methods.description: Creates and configures a CorsConfigurationSource object with origins, methods, headers, and credentials settings, and registers it for all URL paths.
